ListPreference.android:summary: Choose whether to use a blacklist or whitelist approach in blocking apps from being affected by the Sensor Disabler.\nBlacklisted apps will ignore the settings set here.\nWhitelisted apps will use the Sensor Disabler's settings, and non-whitelisted apps will ignore the Sensor Disabler's settings.
